page.title: 11OUR VILLAGE
page.content: The majority of residents in Cliffsend made similar comments about life in the village, the beach along the coast and the friendliness of their neighbours. {COMMENTS FOR: "The area is very picturesque because of the surrounding countryside." {"It's a small community and everyone {seems to get on well with one {another." } "I came from London and Cliffsend is so much quieter." {COMMENTS AGAINST: "The Hoverport rather spoils the area especially from the beach." {"No surgery or doctor in the village {and the cost of bus to Ramsgate is {expensive." } "The beach needs cleaning up and the main road is dangerous and too busy."
